Description:
Family Home Full Of Charm
Charming, comfortable and cozy best sum up this beautiful home. Sitting on a quiet, suburban street, in the heart of Strathdale, minutes from La Trobe University, Strath Village, Brennan Park Pool and the Kennington reservoir, this lovely home would be ideal for families, retirees, couples, or first home buyers.
Relax in the generous family area, with one family room being able to be transformed into a formal sitting area or dining room. The kitchen is a good size with plenty of bench and cupboard space and features a double sink, gas cooktop and oven and a breakfast bar. The dining room opens out to the undercover area, making entertaining easy.
The master bedroom is a generous size and includes a large built in wardrobe and personal access to the family bathroom. Bedrooms 2 and 3 are again of good size with bedroom 3 featuring a built in wardrobe.
The family bathroom features a large shower and vanity with storage along with an independent toilet. Inside the laundry you will find a large stainless steel sink, enough space for all the washer and dryer needs and access to the backyard.
Outside, the yard is a definite feature of this home. The undercover outdoor alfresco area makes it ideal for entertaining, watching the kids play or to simply relax. There is a large yard area surrounded by trees and shrubs. The garden features lovely roses and flowers that come alive through all seasons.
Store the garden tools in the good size garden shed, making it perfect for the handy gardener.
The home is fully fenced, ensuring security and privacy, includes a large water tank, security system, is heated and cooled by the homes ducted system, has railings throughout the home for safety and features two car spaces.
For a charming home, perfect to live and create memories in, then this one will be right for you.

Description:
CHARACTER MEETS CONTEMPORARY IN FAMILY-FRIENDLY RESTORATION
This charming property is family-friendly in both design and location. Situated an easy walk to schools, kindergartens, sporting ground, pharmacy and close to all the amenities on offer at Strath Village and the Kennington Reservoir, this newly refurbished house is ideally positioned.
Centrally located in a quiet street, this weatherboard home offers a neat front garden and secure access to the rear of the property from both sides of the house.
Stairs lead up to a large concrete landing that offers a picturesque outlook over Bendigo’s CBD. Through the front door, you are greeted with a spacious and bright formal entry hallway that offers fantastic built-in storage.
Many original features have been lovingly retained – including authentic timber floorboards, and unique Art Deco cornices in all rooms – and the modern touches, such as the feature lighting in the entry, add a contemporary edge to the design.
Off the hallway are the three bedrooms – all with ceiling fans and the front two offering large windows and built-in robes. The good-sized master bedroom features a walk-through robe leading to a brand new, spacious and light-filled ensuite.
The modern, new family bathroom is also located off the main entry, featuring a large shower and great bathtub.
Off the left off the entry hall is the open plan kitchen and living room. This wonderful space is flooded with natural light and the original Art Deco mantle surrounds a new gas heater.
The brand new kitchen features a high gloss contemporary finish and every detail has been considered including a four-burner gas cooktop, electric oven, dishwasher, soft-close drawers.
Plumbing is ready for the refrigerator if required and the property also enjoys ducted cooling throughout.
Through the rear door you have access to the undercover entertaining area and gorgeous timber deck. A small bar, along with lighting and access to power, ensures this area is ready and waiting for a relaxing summer night outdoors.
The huge backyard, with lawn and large tree, is perfect for family living and the single shed, which is easily accessed at the end of the driveway and through the secure front gates, is powered and offers concrete flooring.
At the rear of the shed is a smaller workshed; perfect as a workshop, to house tools, create a studio or perhaps a spacious cubby house for the kids.
This lovely property has been renovated to a high standard, providing ample natural light throughout, a quality finish and stylish fittings in a neutral palette. Just minutes from all you need and with nothing left to do except put your own stamp on it, this delightful home is a real find.

Immaculately maintained, this quality built home has stood the test of time and offers the complete package for family living.

- Another 3m x 8m garden shed for storing the garden equipment.
Only a short stroll to Kennington Village, schools, walking tracks recreation areas and public transport.
What more could you want?
